title: Rosie's Century
description: A letter from the past, a set of clues, the threat of murder – these bring Rosie back to the gas-lit streets of Dublin 1900 for another great adventure. It is April and Queen Victoria is about to visit the city. Rosie has learnt nothing in school about this event and she’s amazed at the Dubliners’ enthusiasm for the queen. But beneath the holiday atmosphere evil lurks...
author: Ann Carroll
